sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Define the enablement system: discovery guide, pitch, objection handling, demos, case studies, and playbooks.

sections.title: Core Assets
sections.content: One-pager, deck, demo scripts, ROI calculators, competitor battlecards, FAQs, and messaging maps.

sections.title: Process & Training
sections.content: Onboarding program, certification, refresh cadence, feedback loop from sales, content governance.

sections.title: Tooling & Distribution
sections.content: CMS/saleshub, access control, localization, versioning, and analytics for usage/effectiveness.

sections.title: Measurement & KPIs
sections.content: Asset adoption, time-to-first-meeting, stage conversion lift, and win rate impact.
